programme.title: Godzilla, King of the Monsters!
programme.desc: A U.S. newsman (Raymond Burr) in Tokyo recounts the story of a huge dinosaur roused from the sea by an atomic blast.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Justice League: Throne of Atlantis
programme.desc: Aquaman (Matt Lanter) is forced to choose between the Justice League and Atlantis when Atlantean warriors invade Gotham City and Metropolis.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Genius British logician and cryptologist Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) helps crack Germany's Enigma Code during World War II but is later prosecuted by his government for illegal homosexual acts.

programme.title: Justice League: Doom
programme.desc: Vandal Savage uses stolen information from Batman's secret files to mastermind a plan to exterminate the Justice League.

programme.title: Superman: Red Son
programme.desc: An alternate take on Superman portrays him as a Soviet hero after his rocket lands in the USSR.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: Wilson
programme.desc: After reuniting with his ex-wife (Laura Dern), a lonely and neurotic misanthrope (Woody Harrelson) tries to form a connection with the teenage daughter (Isabella Amara) he never knew he had.

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: Feeling responsible for a fatal traffic accident, a high-school student lashes out when her attempts to make amends meet with opposition.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
programme.desc: The Flash causes a temporal ripple that creates a fractured reality where the Justice league has never formed, Superman does not exist and a war rages between Wonder Woman and Aquaman. Flash teams with Batman and Cyborg to restore the timeline.

programme.title: College Field Hockey
programme.desc: From Kentner Stadium in Winston Salem, N.C.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: First Horizon Coliseum in Greensboro, N.C., hosts a match between the Wolverines and Demon Deacons. This is the first meeting between the schools since 2000, when future NBA player Darius Songaila scored 13 points to help Wake Forest to a 71-60 win.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Demon Deacons (14-4, 6-1) surge into their ACC game against the Tar Heels (12-7, 5-2). Wake Forest has won five straight behind Hunter Sallis, who averages 19.5 points per outing. North Carolina comes off a stunning 72-71 setback versus Stanford.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Cardinal continue their initial ACC campaign by hosting the Demon Deacons. The schools split a home-and-home series in 2009 and 2010. Wake Forest has won two of its last three after Demond Claiborne scored twice in a 23-20 triumph over UConn.

programme.title: Women's College Soccer
programme.desc: From Spry Stadium in Winston Salem, N.C.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Wake Forest (12-4, 4-1 ACC) rolls into this matchup against new ACC foe Stanford (11-5, 3-2). The Demon Deacons have won three in a row, and are sporting a 12-1 mark against unranked competition in 2024-25. The Cardinal have won two straight.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 seed Wolfpack battle the No. 3 Blue Devils in the ACC Tournament final. NC State seeks its fourth title in the last six years after ousting North Carolina 66-55 in the semifinals. Duke, which last won in 2013, dispatched Notre Dame 61-56.

programme.desc: The No. 1 Longhorns (34-3) face the No. 2 Horned Frogs (34-3) in the NCAA Tournament's Elite Eight. Big 12 champion TCU has won 13 in a row after taking down No. 2 Notre Dame in the Sweet 16. Texas seeks its first Final Four appearance since 1987.

programme.title: 2025 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament
programme.desc: The No. 1 Trojans, minus JuJu Watkins, face the No. 2 Huskies in an NCAA Tournament Elite Eight duel. USC pressed on without its injured star, knocking off Kansas State 67-61 in the Sweet 16, while Paige Bueckers' 40 points led UConn past Oklahoma.

programme.title: 2025 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament

programme.title: 2025 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament
programme.desc: The No. 2 Huskies face the No. 1 Bruins in the NCAA Tournament's Final Four. Paige Bueckers had 31 points as UConn eliminated No. 1 USC and advanced to a record 24th Final Four. Lauren Betts has averaged 23 points per game through UCLA's tourney run.

programme.title: 2025 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament
programme.desc: Paige Bueckers looks to cap her college career with a title as the Huskies draw the Gamecocks in the NCAA Tournament final. UConn seeks a record 12th national championship. South Carolina plays for its fourth title since 2017 under Dawn Staley.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
